Ejemplo de código
def eratosthenes_sieve(n): # Create a candidate list within which non-primes will be # marked as None; only candidates below sqrt(n) need be checked. candidates = list(range(n+1)) fin = int(n**0.5)
# Loop over the candidates, marking out each multiple. for i in xrange(2, fin+1): if candidates[i]: candidates[2*i::i] = [None] * (n//i - 1)
# Filter out non-primes and return the list. return [i for i in candidates[2:] if i]
